TopicTitle: I just now found out that...

Articles.Content:
"In California, almost all female pistachio trees are the [cultivar](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Cultivar) '[Kerman](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Kerman#Economy)'." - [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Pistachio#Cultivation](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Pistachio#Cultivation)

![:confused:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_huh.gif)
It's true. We are Human Space Program. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
Pistachios are green. Kerbals are green. I WANT TO BELIEVE!!
Hmmm...if pistachios are kerbals, I guess that makes me the kraken.

> 
> Hmmm...if pistachios are kerbals, I guess that makes me the kraken.

I have certainly been krakin' this week. Many Kermans have sacrificed their oily goodness for my greater good.
I know someone who is DEFINITELY the kraken in this case.

> 
> "In California, almost all female pistachio trees are the [cultivar](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Cultivar) '[Kerman](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Kerman#Economy)'." - [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Pistachio#Cultivation](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Pistachio#Cultivation)
> ![:confused:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_huh.gif)

Interestingly enough, my mom studied at a university in Kerman.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-06-27T21:35:34Z" title="06/27/2015 09:35  PM" data-short="9 yr">June 27, 2015</time> by mythbusters844**

> 
> Pistachios are green. Kerbals are green. I WANT TO BELIEVE!!

 Eeloominati confirmed!!! We did it guys

> 
> Interestingly enough, my mom studied at a university in Kerman.

Don't tell me; She studied ... wait for it ..... spaceflight? lol ![;)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif)
